org.drip.spline.bspline

Class SegmentBasisFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.quant.function1D.AbstractUnivariate
      • org.drip.spline.bspline.SegmentBasisFunction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SegmentMonicBasisFunction, SegmentMulticBasisFunction

    public abstract class SegmentBasisFunction
extends AbstractUnivariate
    SegmentBasisFunction is the abstract class over which the local ordered envelope functions for the B Splines are implemented. It exposes the following stubs: - Retrieve the Order of the B Spline. - Retrieve the Leading Predictor Ordinate. - Retrieve the Following Predictor Ordinate. - Retrieve the Trailing Predictor Ordinate. - Compute the complete Envelope Integrand - this will serve as the Envelope Normalizer. - Evaluate the Cumulative Normalized Integrand up to the given ordinate.
